item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "My occupational hazard is my occupation's just not around..." -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "I'd rather die while I'm living than live while I'm dead. " -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "If we couldn't laugh we would all go insane." -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "We need more fruitcakes in this world, and less bakers!" -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "It's a fine line between Saturday night and Sunday morning." -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a purpose." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Cameron add a quote by marquis de sade
item.description: "Either kill me or take me as I am, because I'll be damned if I ever change." -- marquis de sade

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Steve Almond
item.description: "The answer is that we don't choose our freaks, they choose us." -- Steve Almond

item.title: Cameron add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "She's the sort of woman who lives for others - you can tell the others by their hunted expression." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Good sex is like good bridge. If you don't have a good partner, you'd better have a good hand." -- Mae West

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "Some of it's magic and some of it's tragic but I had a good life all the way." -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "Indecision may or may not be my problem." -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "Shells sink, dreams float. Life's good on our boat. " -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "Mother Mother Ocean, I have heard your call." -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been. " -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Cameron add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "Pack your bags, we're going on a guilt trip!" -- Jimmy Buffett
